name: Bio-Harvest
description:
This game was made for Ludum Dare 52 with the theme 'Harvest'. About the game

Bio-Harvest is a dark survival game where you need to harvest the organs of your enemies in order to survive.

Gain bullets, health, and bombs by killing your enemies and dragging their corpses to your harvesting table, then go out and hunt for more enemies!

How to play (because we never implemented an explanation oops)

Aim with Mouse

WASD to Move

Shift to Sprint

LMB to Shoot

RMB to Throw bomb (Must be standing still.)

R to Reload your gun

E to Drag and Drop corpse

1, 2, or 3 on the table with a corpse on it will create bullets, health, and ammo respectively

Credits

acousticAnalyst - Programming
